Posts.Content: My sister was just diagnosed again this week with breast cancer the outcome does not look good. I am trying to be positive and get as much information as I can to educate myself and help my sister as well.
Posts.Title: Reoccuring Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: I am sorry to hear that. I am hear if you would like to chat. I have had my father with a brain tumor and my mother with lymphoma non-Hodgkins and my sister was diagnosed a year and 1/2 ago with breast cancer. She was just diagnosed again this week with breast cancer again. I can relate to your situation.
Posts.Title: Ladies With Breastcancer
